revised_title: A New Method for Estimating Gaseous Exchanges in Submerged Plants
tldr: The authors develop a new method to measure the gaseous exchanges of submerged plants, allowing for a more accurate assessment of assimilation and respiration under various conditions. The method involves a continuous water current containing dissolved CO2 flowing over the plant, with the difference in CO2 content before and after contact with the plant measuring the assimilation taking place.
